announcements.name: Hypixel SkyBlock 0.21 - Rift Mountaintop
announcements.description: Today we are releasing Hypixel SkyBlock 0.21, which features The Mountaintop, a new content-pack zone at the end of The Rift.

announcements.name: Hypixel SkyBlock 0.20.8 - Pesthunter's Wares, Chocolate Factory Additions, and more!
announcements.description: Hello!  Welcome to Hypixel SkyBlock Patch 0.20.8. Today's update includes a general update to Pests, some Garden balancing, and a Chocolate Factory update that lets you take breaks from Hoppity without any downtime.  Read on for all the details!
